name: Nigel
description:
Nigel is a single player, puzzle experience where you play as Nigel the Gannet. While on Mana Island, you will be playing matchmaker and helping the other animals on the island find true love, perhaps even finding it yourself! 

Find the kaka or listen to the narrator for hints!

We were inspired by the real Nigel the gannet. In our opinion, the story of Nigel was a beautiful love story that deserves to be heard by a larger audience.

Controls:

          Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

          Action Button - 'E'

          Pause Button - Escape
